6// TransformFeedbackMtl.h:
7// Defines the class interface for TransformFeedbackMtl, implementing TransformFeedbackImpl.
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_TRANSFORMFEEDBACKMTL_H_
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_TRANSFORMFEEDBACKMTL_H_
12
13#include <Metal/Metal.h>
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/TransformFeedbackImpl.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/BufferMtl.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_resources.h"
17
18typedef uint64_t MtlDeviceSize;
19
20namespace gl
21{
22class ProgramState;
23} // namespace gl
24
25namespace rx
26{
27
28class TransformFeedbackMtl : public TransformFeedbackImpl
29{
30 public:
31 TransformFeedbackMtl(const gl::TransformFeedbackState &state);
32 ~TransformFeedbackMtl() override;
33
34 angle::Result begin(const gl::Context *context, gl::PrimitiveMode primitiveMode) override;
35 angle::Result end(const gl::Context *context) override;
36 angle::Result pause(const gl::Context *context) override;
37 angle::Result resume(const gl::Context *context) override;
38
39 angle::Result bindIndexedBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
40 size_t index,
41 const gl::OffsetBindingPointer<gl::Buffer> &binding) override;
42
43 void getBufferOffsets(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
44 GLint drawCallFirstVertex,
45 int32_t *offsetsOut,
46 size_t offsetsSize) const;
47
48 const gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<BufferMtl *> &getBufferHandles() const
49 {
50 return mBufferHandles;
51 }
52
53 private:
54 gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<BufferMtl *> mBufferHandles;
55 gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<MtlDeviceSize> mBufferOffsets;
56 gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<MtlDeviceSize> mBufferSizes;
57
58 // Aligned offset for emulation. Could be smaller than offset.
59 gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<MtlDeviceSize> mAlignedBufferOffsets;
60};
61
62} // namespace rx
63
64#endif // LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_TRANSFORMFEEDBACKMTL_H_
65
